III.ii.3.1.g
.
Claimant Notification When PMRs Are Unavailable
As noted in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.C.3.a
, VA must notify the claimant of its inability to obtain relevant PMRs the claimant identified.  This requirement is met by the rating activity when it enters the following text in the
Evidence
section of the rating decision:
Private medical records requested from
[name of provider]
, but not received
.  Claimants receive a copy of the rating decision with the corresponding decision notice.
Important
:  The rating activity must enter the referenced text in the rating decision regardless of whether the records were requested by the PMR Program contractor or an RO.
References
:  For more information on
determining relevance of records, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.E.1
documenting claims folder when evidence is not considered relevant, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.E.1.f
the
Evidence
section of the rating decision, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.A.4
, and
decision notices, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.B
.
